title: I can log into Legacy but...
body:
When I go to log into alpha it says invalid username and password.

yes its not caps

no its not number lock

yes im entering the right password

ive tried switching back in forth clients and I can only log into legacy

replies.body: Can you confirm you've selected the right language/region at the bottom-right of the Beta Client's login screen before entering your login details?
i have verified that for me but im using the beta client not the alpha client
im having the same problem but with the beta client, ive even gone as far as chaning my password
Having the same problem right now...
